org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework

类 FlinkResourceManager<WorkerType extends ResourceIDRetrievable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.FlinkUntypedActor
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.FlinkResourceManager<WorkerType>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor
    直接已知子类:
    StandaloneResourceManager

    public abstract class FlinkResourceManager<WorkerType extends ResourceIDRetrievable>
extends FlinkUntypedActor

    Worker allocation steps

    1. The resource manager decides to request more workers. This can happen in order to fill the initial pool, or as a result of the JobManager requesting more workers.
    2. The resource master calls requestNewWorkers(int), which triggers requests for more containers. After that, the getNumWorkerRequestsPending() should reflect the pending requests.
    3. The concrete framework may acquire containers and then trigger to start TaskManagers in those containers. That should be reflected in getNumWorkersPendingRegistration().
    4. At some point, the TaskManager processes will have started and send a registration message to the JobManager. The JobManager will perform a lookup with the ResourceManager to check if it really started this TaskManager. The method workerStarted(ResourceID) will be called to inform about a registered worker.

      • getDesignatedWorkerPoolSize

        public int getDesignatedWorkerPoolSize()
        Gets the current designated worker pool size, meaning the number of workers that the resource master strives to maintain. The actual number of workers may be lower (if worker requests are still pending) or higher (if workers have not yet been released).
        返回:
        The designated worker pool size.

      • getNumberOfStartedTaskManagers

        public int getNumberOfStartedTaskManagers()
        Gets the number of currently started TaskManagers.
        返回:
        The number of currently started TaskManagers.

        public boolean isStarted(ResourceID resourceId)
        Gets the started worker for a given resource ID, if one is available.
        参数:
        resourceId - The resource ID for the worker.
        返回:
        True if already registered, otherwise false

        返回:

      • triggerConnectingToJobManager

        protected void triggerConnectingToJobManager(String leaderAddress)
        Causes the resource manager to announce itself at the new leader JobManager and obtains its connection information and currently known TaskManagers.
        参数:
        leaderAddress - The akka actor URL of the new leader JobManager.

      • triggerCheckWorkers

        public void triggerCheckWorkers()
        This method causes the resource framework master to asynchronouslyre-examine the set of available and pending workers containers, and release or allocate containers if needed. The method sends an actor message which will trigger the re-examination.

      • notifyWorkerFailed

        public void notifyWorkerFailed(ResourceID resourceID,
                               String message)
        This method should be called by the framework once it detects that a currently registered worker has failed.
        参数:
        resourceID - Id of the worker that has failed.
        message - An informational message that explains why the worker failed.

      • initialize

        protected abstract void initialize()
                            throws Exception
        Initializes the framework specific components.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions during initialization cause the resource manager to fail. If the framework is able to recover this resource manager, it will be restarted.

      • shutdownApplication

        protected abstract void shutdownApplication(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                                            String optionalDiagnostics)
        The framework specific code for shutting down the application. This should report the application's final status and shut down the resource manager cleanly. This method also needs to make sure all pending containers that are not registered yet are returned.
        参数:
        finalStatus - The application status to report.
        optionalDiagnostics - An optional diagnostics message.

      • fatalError

        protected abstract void fatalError(String message,
                                   Throwable error)
        Notifies the resource master of a fatal error.

        IMPORTANT: This should not cleanly shut down this master, but exit it in such a way that a high-availability setting would restart this or fail over to another master.

      • requestNewWorkers

        protected abstract void requestNewWorkers(int numWorkers)
        Requests to allocate a certain number of new workers.
        参数:
        numWorkers - The number of workers to allocate.

      • releasePendingWorker

        protected abstract void releasePendingWorker(ResourceID resourceID)
        Trigger a release of a pending worker.
        参数:
        resourceID - The worker resource id

      • releaseStartedWorker

        Trigger a release of a started worker.
        参数:

      • workerStarted

        protected abstract WorkerType workerStarted(ResourceID resourceID)
        Callback when a worker was started.
        参数:
        resourceID - The worker resource id

      • reacceptRegisteredWorkers

        protected abstract Collection<WorkerType> reacceptRegisteredWorkers(Collection<ResourceID> registered)
        This method is called when the resource manager starts after a failure and reconnects to the leader JobManager, who still has some workers registered. The method is used to consolidate the view between resource manager and JobManager. The resource manager gets the list of TaskManagers that the JobManager considers available and should return a list or nodes that the resource manager considers available. After that, the JobManager is informed of loss of all TaskManagers that are not part of the returned list. It is possible that the resource manager initially confirms some TaskManagers to be alive, even through they are in an uncertain status, if it later sends necessary failure notifications via calling notifyWorkerFailed(ResourceID, String).
        参数:
        registered - The list of TaskManagers that the JobManager knows.
        返回:
        The subset of TaskManagers that the resource manager can confirm to be alive.

      • getNumWorkerRequestsPending

        protected abstract int getNumWorkerRequestsPending()
        Gets the number of requested workers that have not yet been granted.
        返回:
        The number pending worker requests. Must never be smaller than 0.

      • getNumWorkersPendingRegistration

        protected abstract int getNumWorkersPendingRegistration()
        Gets the number of containers that have been started, but where the TaskManager has not yet registered at the job manager.
        返回:
        The number of started containers pending TaskManager registration. Must never be smaller than 0.

      • sendInfoMessage

        protected void sendInfoMessage(String message)

      • startResourceManagerActors

        public static akka.actor.ActorRef startResourceManagerActors(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration,
                                                             akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem,
                                                             LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetriever,
                                                             Class<? extends FlinkResourceManager<?>> resourceManagerClass)
        Starts the resource manager actors.
        参数:
        configuration - The configuration for the resource manager
        actorSystem - The actor system to start the resource manager in
        leaderRetriever - The leader retriever service to intialize the resource manager
        resourceManagerClass - The class of the ResourceManager to be started
        返回:
        ActorRef of the resource manager

      • startResourceManagerActors

        public static akka.actor.ActorRef startResourceManagerActors(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration,
                                                             akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem,
                                                             LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetriever,
                                                             Class<? extends FlinkResourceManager<?>> resourceManagerClass,

        Starts the resource manager actors.
        参数:
        configuration - The configuration for the resource manager
        actorSystem - The actor system to start the resource manager in
        leaderRetriever - The leader retriever service to intialize the resource manager
        resourceManagerClass - The class of the ResourceManager to be started
        resourceManagerActorName - The name of the resource manager actor.
        返回:
